root.ln: Galaxy name. Leave blank for random.
Defines the physical size of the galaxy.
Determines how much fog is randomly generated in each sector. 0 means no fog at all. Note that View Distance is only affected by the Medium in-game setting.
Alternate soundtrack uses the file mayhem_data\custom_musics.txt instead of ...\custom_musics_lu.txt.
Friend is Unbreakable Alliance, Foe is Total War, Dynamic is default. Untick to deactivate a race. 1 race minimum.
Sectors of the Commonwealth are randomly assigned instead of forming a coherent territory.
The main factions have less single isolated sectors.
The galaxy has one giant hole in the middle. Incompatible with Shattered galaxy.
The galaxy has less sectors. Incompatible with Hollowed galaxy.
Each sector receives extra population, research and support.
Sith tend to regroup around the same areas instead of being randomly spawned.
By default, this program creates backup folders and restore/delete your savegames when changing galaxy. If you don't want this to happen, tick this checkbox.
Draw a rough preview of the galaxy layout. Disabled by default to avoid any spoil. Cannot preview non-generated galaxies.
Do not show the special menu before launching X3.
Keep the Game Creator opened after launching X3.
Backup folder name. Will be created if it doesn't exist.
Your savegames have been successfully copied to the backup folder.
Error: both source and destination folders are the same.
All savegames in '{1}' will be deleted before restoration. Would you like to continue?
Considering this is the first time you run X3 with a custom galaxy, all your previous savegames have been backed up to {1}backup_origin.

By default, this program handles your savegames accordingly to the galaxy you select. In the process, saves are obviously moved or deleted. If you play another mod, or if you want to play a custom galaxy, you'll have to manually manage your savegames by checking the 'Do not handle my savegames' checkbox.

The expansion setting has been set to 'None'. All factions will start with only one sector and the galaxy will have a high amount of Xenons and Pirates. The game pace will be very slow, as Mayhem has not primarily been designed to start from scratch. If you're a new player, this setting is not recommended. Do you want to proceed anyway?
The size of the galaxy is below average. It is recommended to play with the "Extra sector stats" galaxy trait. Do you want to activate this trait now?
You currently have backed up savegames on that galaxy. Are you sure you want to delete this galaxy and all associated savegames?
You will lose all your savegames on the current galaxy. Are you sure you want to delete this galaxy and all associated savegames?
X3AP.exe not found in root folder.
Cannot start default browser, please use the following link: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Joubarbe
Critical error while trying to create '{1}'.
Critical error while trying to read '{1}'.
The galaxy name {1} is already taken. Operation aborted.
